com.yesteapea.utils

Class KdTree<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yesteapea.utils.KdTree<T>

  • public class KdTree<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by saiteja on 4/12/15. Complexity - Contruction : N.Log(N).log(N) - nearest Neighbour : expected Log(N). - find within : size of result set TODO: - For now this is a 2d tree, but can be generalized to any k if there is a requirement - Inserts not allowed to keep code less complex (self balancing)

        public KdTree.Node<T> nearestNeighbour(double x,

        Recurisvely checks all the points and updates the best. Pruning away the nodes (and the subtree below it) makes it efficient

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        nearest node from the input point

        Recurisvely checks all the points and updates the best. Pruning away the nodes (and the subtree below it) makes it efficient
